page.title: 11Some Local News
page.content: {The Headland-H/pool By Mark Dolan {and by Matthew Porritt} When we looked in a local newspaper we found that some interesting things were happening in our town in May 1985.An old lady has left 18,000 pounds to the{Hartlepool Hospice.}Some people have been raising money to open a hospice for people who are very ill. People from H/pool have been trying to raise money for{Ethiopia}where there is a famine.The mayor has been receiving money for the Ethiopian appeal. Bird-lovers have been coming to Hartlepool Headland because a{rare {bird called a blue-throat}has been spotted in quite large numbers.{A {television personality}called 'Supergran' came to the Borough Hall where there was a Disco for children. Supergran is a very powerful person.
